body:
My minimum reproduce (running docker build) still fails when I run on the master branch.

<details>

```
WARNING: Sandboxed execution is not supported on your system and thus hermeticity of actions cannot be guaranteed. See http://bazel.io/docs/bazel-user-manual.html#sandboxing for more information. You can turn off this warning via --ignore_unsupported_sandboxing.
ERROR: com.google.devtools.build.lib.packages.BuildFileContainsErrorsException: error loading package '': Encountered error while reading extension file 'cuda/build_defs.bzl': no such package '@local_config_cuda//cuda': Traceback (most recent call last):
    File "/tensorflow/third_party/gpus/cuda_configure.bzl", line 506
        _create_cuda_repository(repository_ctx)
    File "/tensorflow/third_party/gpus/cuda_configure.bzl", line 435, in _create_cuda_repository
        _find_cudnn_header_dir(repository_ctx, cudnn_install_base...)
    File "/tensorflow/third_party/gpus/cuda_configure.bzl", line 291, in _find_cudnn_header_dir
        auto_configure_fail("Cannot find cudnn.h under %s" %...)
    File "/tensorflow/third_party/gpus/cuda_configure.bzl", line 93, in auto_configure_fail
        fail("
%sAuto-Configuration Error:%s ...))

Auto-Configuration Error: Cannot find cudnn.h under /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu
```

</details>
